column.name: winners_date
column.Comment: NULL if there is no 'winner' page

column.name: winners_body
column.Comment: NULL if '당첨자 페이지 생성 여부' is N

column.Comment: NULL if the receivers are all the users (push_agree Y)

column.Comment: demon will change this value after inserting push_records.
